title: Sonic The Hedgehog Creator Arrested - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.18.22
description:
Go to http://rocketmoney.com/kindafunny to cancel your unnecessary subscriptions with Rocket Money.

Go to http://policygenius.com to get your free life insurance quotes.

Go to http://shopify.com/kfgames to sign up for a free trial and start selling today.

Locked up... they won't let him go fast. Blessing and Tim talk about Sonic's co-creator getting arrested, Pokemon running like garbo, and Splinter Cel concept art.
